content.text: Eiri is a giant who resided on Elbaf 63 years ago. He was once severely injured by a young Charlotte Linlin.
As a giant, Eiri likely possesses great physical strength. However, when Charlotte Linlin hit him, a lot of his bones were broken.
63 years before the present day, a mosquito landed on Eiri and Charlotte Linlin tried to hit it. However, she hit with such force that several of Eiri's bones were broken.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 86 Chapter 866, Eiri is first mentioned.
